text: Steven Ogg is a Canadian actor. He is best known for his roles as Trevor Philips in the video game Grand Theft Auto V (2013) and as Simon in the AMC series The Walking Dead. He has also appeared in television series such as Better Call Saul, Law & Order, Person of Interest, Broad City and Westworld. Ogg was born in Calgary, Alberta. He has a son, Bodhi. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Calgary Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian television actors
title: Steven Ogg
